New World Coordinates - Markup Database API Doc Updated at: 2019-04-27 18:00:00 PST

Resources

  • GET /v1/projects
  • POST /v1/project
  • GET /v1/versions
  • POST /v1/version
  • POST /v1/markups
  • POST /v1/markup
  • GET /v1/markup/:markupId
  • UPDATE /v1/markup/:markupId
  • DELETE /v1/markup/:markupId

GET /v1/projects

Description: Attempts to get all of the project records in the database.

Access: FREE
Return: [JSON] - Returns an array of all project records.

POST /v1/project

Description: Attempts to create a new project record in the projects table.

Access: FREE
Return: JSON - Returns a project record for the newly created project.
Parameters:
  • name : string - The name of the new project.

GET /v1/versions

Description: Attempts to get all of the version records for a specifc porjectId.

Access: FREE
Return: [JSON] - Returns an array of all version records.
Parameters:
  • project_id : int - The projectId to filter the versions by.

POST /v1/version

Description: Attempts to create a new version record in the versions table.

Access: FREE
Return: JSON - Returns a version record for the newly created version.
Parameters:
  • project_id : string - The project_id of the project the version belongs to.
  • version : string - The version number.

POST /v1/markups

Description: Attempts to get all of the markups for the specified versions.

Access: FREE
Return: [JSON] - Returns an array of markup records
Parameters:
  • version : string - The version number of the records to return.

POST /v1/markup

Description: Attempts to create a new markup record.

Access: FREE
Return: JSON - Returns a markup record for the newly created markup
Parameters:
  • markup_id : string - An UUID to uniquely identify the markup
  • version_id : int - The version_id this markup will belong to.
  • type : string - The name of the type of data to be stored in data.
  • data : string - A serialized JSON blob that will allow recreation of the class based on type.
  • creator : string - The name of the creator of the markup.
  • assigned : string - The name of the person the markup is assigned to.
  • location : string - The serialized Vector3 of the markups location to be used for dashboarding.
  • status : string - The status of the Markup.

GET /v1/markup/:markupId

Description: Attempts to return a specified markup record.

Access: FREE
Return: JSON - Returns the record for the markup specified

UPDATE /v1/markup/:markupId

Description: Attempts to update the specified markup record.

Access: FREE
Return: JSON - Returns the record of the updated markup.
Parameters:
  • version_id : int - The version_id this markup will belong to.
  • type : string - The name of the type of data to be stored in data.
  • data : string - A serialized JSON blob that will allow recreation of the class based on type.
  • creator : string - The name of the creator of the markup.
  • assigned : string - The name of the person assigned to the markup.
  • location : string - The serialized Vector3 of the markups location to be used for dashboarding
  • status : string - The status of the markup.

DELETE /v1/markup/:markupId

Description: Attempts to delete the specified markup record

Access: FREE
Return: string - The markup has been deleted
